data.meta_description: Httpswww.ersnet.orgwp Contentuploads202208ExportFinalProgram 19082022113125.PDF - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides a detailed programme for the ERS International Congress 2022 occurring on Monday August 22, 2022. It includes 9 pre-congress sessions covering statements and technical standards on various respiratory topics. Session topics include the syndrome of combined pulmonary fibrosis and emphysema, updated pulmonary function test interpretation, scoring respiratory events using Type III devices, defining respiratory exacerbations in children with bronchiectasis, guidelines for managing hospitalized COVID-19 patients, long COVID follow-up, and the core outcome set for evaluating COPD exacerbation management. Each session includes the session title, presenter, and aim/learning objectives.
